trans-unit.source: Be careful! Depending on the options selected, former manually uploaded thumbnails might be erased and replaced by automatically generated thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: Be careful! Depending on the options selected, former manually uploaded thumbnails might be erased and replaced by automatically generated thumbnails.

trans-unit.source: Also, regenerating thumbnails for all existing images can take several minutes, please be patient.
trans-unit.target: Also, regenerating thumbnails for all existing images can take several minutes, please be patient.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to keep your images stored in the previous system. There's nothing wrong with that.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to keep your images stored in the previous system. There's nothing wrong with that.

trans-unit.source: After moving all of your product images, set the "Use the legacy image filesystem" option above to "No" for best performance.
trans-unit.target: After moving all of your product images, set the "Use the legacy image filesystem" option above to "No" for best performance.

trans-unit.source: Delete the images linked to this image setting
trans-unit.target: Delete the images linked to this image setting

trans-unit.source: If you delete this image format, the theme won't be able to use it anymore. This will result in a degraded experience on your front office.
trans-unit.target: If you delete this image format, the theme won't be able to use it anymore. This will result in a degraded experience on your front office.

trans-unit.source: Regenerate thumbnails for the selected images? With the "erase" option enabled, the previously selected thumbnails will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Regenerate thumbnails for the selected images? With the "erase" option enabled, the previously selected thumbnails will be deleted.

trans-unit.source: Current theme is unavailable. Please check your theme's directory name ("%s") and permissions.
trans-unit.target: Current theme is unavailable. Please check your theme's directory name ("%s") and permissions.

trans-unit.source: Source file does not exist or is empty (%filepath%)
trans-unit.target: Source file does not exist or is empty (%filepath%)

trans-unit.source: Failed to resize image file (%filepath%)
trans-unit.target: Failed to resize image file (%filepath%)

trans-unit.source: Original image is corrupt (%filename%) for product ID %id% or bad permission on folder.
trans-unit.target: Original image is corrupt (%filename%) for product ID %id% or bad permission on folder.

trans-unit.source: Original image is missing or empty (%filename%) for product ID %id%
trans-unit.target: Original image is missing or empty (%filename%) for product ID %id%

trans-unit.source: An error occurred. The information "%s" is missing.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred. The information "%s" is missing.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred. The template "%s" is missing.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred. The template "%s" is missing.

trans-unit.source: Only part of the images have been regenerated. The server timed out before finishing.
trans-unit.target: Only part of the images have been regenerated. The server timed out before finishing.

trans-unit.source: Cannot write images for this type: %1$s. Please check the %2$s folder's writing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Cannot write images for this type: %1$s. Please check the %2$s folder's writing permissions.

trans-unit.source: Server timed out. The watermark may not have been applied to all images.
trans-unit.target: Server timed out. The watermark may not have been applied to all images.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while uploading the favicon: cannot copy file "%s" to folder "%s".
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while uploading the favicon: cannot copy file "%s" to folder "%s".

trans-unit.source: Your theme has been correctly exported: %path%
trans-unit.target: Your theme has been correctly exported: %path%

trans-unit.source: The page Category cannot be moved here.
trans-unit.target: The page Category cannot be moved here.

trans-unit.source: Your RTL stylesheets has been generated successfully
trans-unit.target: Your RTL stylesheets has been generated successfully

trans-unit.source: Your theme has been correctly reset to its default settings. You may want to regenerate your images. See the Improve > Design > Images Settings screen for the '%regenerate_label%' button.
trans-unit.target: Your theme has been correctly reset to its default settings. You may want to regenerate your images. See the Improve > Design > Images Settings screen for the '%regenerate_label%' button.

trans-unit.source: There is already a theme %theme_name% in your themes folder. Remove it if you want to continue.
trans-unit.target: There is already a theme %theme_name% in your themes folder. Remove it if you want to continue.

trans-unit.source: Failed to delete theme. Make sure you have permissions and theme is not used.
trans-unit.target: Failed to delete theme. Make sure you have permissions and theme is not used.

trans-unit.source: Cannot adapt theme to RTL languages.
trans-unit.target: Cannot adapt theme to RTL languages.

trans-unit.source: This name already exists.
trans-unit.target: This name already exists.

trans-unit.source: Invalid file format.
trans-unit.target: Invalid file format.

trans-unit.source: After modification, do not forget to regenerate thumbnails
trans-unit.target: After modification, do not forget to regenerate thumbnails

trans-unit.source: Make sure the theme you use doesn't rely on this image format before deleting it.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the theme you use doesn't rely on this image format before deleting it.
trans-unit.note: Line: 30 Comment: Regenerate button is only shown for internal API clients (identified via external_issuer field being null)

trans-unit.source: Warning: if no email logo is available, the main logo will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Warning: if no email logo is available, the main logo will be used instead.
